mapper.select: select * from (select proid,dreturn,zreturn,wreturn,dreturn+zreturn+wreturn as totalreturn,wreturn || '/' || (dreturn+zreturn+wreturn) || '（完成率' || trunc((wreturn/(dreturn+zreturn+wreturn)*100),2) || '%）' as completerate from (select o.projectsid as proid,p.returnenddate, sum(case when ord_status =80 then 1 else 0 end) as dreturn, sum(case when ord_status =96 then 1 else 0 end) as zreturn, sum(case when ord_status =81 then 1 else 0 end) as wreturn from orders o,projects p where (o.projectsid=p.projectsid and p.projectsstate=85 and not p.returnenddate>sysdate) group by o.projectsid)) orders,projects p,projects_describe pb,pro_money pm where orders.proid=p.projectsid and pb.projectsid=p.projectsid and pm.projectsid=p.projectsid and p.projectsstate=85
mapper.update: update projects set projectsstate=#{projectsstate} where empid=#{empid} and projectsid=#{projectsid}
mapper.select: select ord_id,empid,projectsid,paymoney,sum(paymoney) over() emoney ,round(paymoney/sum(paymoney) over() * #{money},2) proportion,87 ordstatus,158 DETAILS,31 capitalflow from orders where (ord_status=80 or ord_status=136) and projectsid=#{proid}
